name: MJ
description: Reiko Yamaguchi – MJ A5, 20 pages, hand-stitched, B/W, colour cover. MJ, a book about the changing face of Michel Jackson—from a young boy to an icon—produced in response to our Design Workshop brief, by Reiko Yamaguchi. The original one-off book made during May 2009, uncannily anticipating the death of Mr. Jackson. An edition of 100, printed locally, July 2009. Made in Kyoto & Ogaki See more

name: Facebook
description: James Gibson - Facebook ‘I see faces everywhere’. A5, 36 pages, hand-stitched, B/W, colour cover. As part of the Design Workshop classes, the students were asked to make a series of collections using whatever means available (photography, sketching etc.) and present these in a predefined book format. One of which was Facebook. Given a week to collect and make each book, the students repeatedly produced surprising and inspiring interpretations of the simple briefs. The images within this book, are but a few of the students outcomes. An edition of 100, printed locally, July 2009. Made in Kyoto & Ogaki. See more

name: Typogaki Book 2
description: James Gibson - Typogaki Book 2. A5, 36 pages, hand-stitched, B/W, colour cover. Since 2006, the Typogaki project has annually investigated a different part of Ogaki city, with over 2000 photographs compiled to date. This hand-made book is a digest of the images collected during class of 2009, shedding some light on the urban history… ...the collection continues. An edition of 100, printed locally, July 2009. Made in Kyoto & Ogaki. See more
